title: Social Media Strategist
description:
TrendSync Media is Looking for a Social Media Strategist (Part-Time)

Based in Singapore, TrendSync Media is a boutique agency crafting vibrant social media campaigns for clients in lifestyle, tech, and education. We’re seeking a creative Social Media Strategist to elevate our clients’ online presence.

Role Summary
This part-time role focuses on developing social media strategies that amplify brand voices, offering flexibility to balance creative work with other commitments.

Key Tasks
- Create social media strategies for Instagram, TikTok, and LinkedIn.
- Schedule engaging content aligned with client branding.
- Monitor performance using Sprout Social and Hootsuite.
- Manage community interactions to build loyalty.
- Conduct competitor analysis for differentiation.
- Collaborate with designers for visual content.
- Optimize content performance based on analytics.
- Stay updated on social media trends.
- Prepare monthly reports for clients.
- Support client meetings on strategy.

What We Need
Candidates should have 1–3 years of experience in social media marketing, proficient in Sprout Social, Hootsuite, and analytics tools. Strong content creation and communication skills are essential, along with community engagement experience. A Bachelor’s degree in marketing, communications, or a related field is required.

Why TrendSync?
We’re a small team that values creativity and flexibility. Our remote-first approach allows work from anywhere in Singapore, with occasional meetups for collaboration. We provide premium tools and support growth through workshops and courses.

Perks
Health insurance for part-time staff
Flexible hours
15 days of paid leave (pro-rated)
Access to social media tools
Professional development stipend
Team social events

Join Us
Apply now to create impactful social media campaigns with TrendSync Media!
